SEARCH
Package com.serezk4.configuration

Class FileConfiguration

java.lang.Object
com.serezk4.configuration.FileConfiguration
public final class FileConfiguration extends Object
Configuration class for file paths used in the application.

The FileConfiguration class provides constants for file paths used by the application, such as the ID sequence file and the data storage file. It ensures that these files exist and are accessible, creating them if necessary.

Since:
1.0

  • Field Details

    • ID_FILE_PATH

      public static final Path ID_FILE_PATH
      Path to the file used for storing the ID sequence.

    • DATA_FILE_PATH

      public static final Path DATA_FILE_PATH
      Path to the file used for storing application data.

      The path is determined from the DATA_FILE_PATH environment variable, defaulting to data.json if not set.

  • Method Details

    • checkFile

      private static void checkFile(Path path)
      Ensures that the specified file exists and is accessible.

      If the file does not exist, this method attempts to create it. Warnings are issued if the file is not readable or writable. If file creation fails, the application exits with an error status.

      Parameters:
      path - the Path of the file to check
